title: TruckHub
description: Represents the properties of a TruckHub

hub.description: A single word name of the directory containing the track hub files. Not displayed to hub users

shortLabel.description: The short name for the track hub. Displayed as the hub name on the Track Hubs page and the track group name on the browser tracks page

longLabel.description: A longer descriptive label for the track hub. Displayed in the description field on the Track Hubs page

email.description: The contact to whom questions regarding the track hub should be directed
